nodes.text: Eriadu Spaceport was the spaceport serving Eriadu City on the planet of Eriadu. Many of the delegates to the Eriadu Trade Summit including Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum—and his would-be assassins—landed at the spaceport prior to attending the summit. New arrivals were required to pass through Eriadu Customs and Immigration, and many vessels were subject to search by customs and immigration officials.
